website_summaries.verdict: Soft and cushioned, this mattress is meant for children who are at least 12 months old.
pros: High-density foam mattress with waterproof polyester cover
Hypoallergenic cover protects against bacteria, mold, dust mites, and allergens
cons: Manufacturer states that this mattress isn't intended for child younger than 1

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: This was very hard to keep clean and my daughter drools a lot. So now it has mold on it and it’s not just on the cover it’s in the foam of the mattress to and I have to order a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Offutt

customer_reviews.title: Must Have This if you have a Pack and Play for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: With 4 kids I really don't have a lot of time to write a review but for this one I am doing it if it helps another parent get some sleep - this mattress saved our vacation because all we could take was a pack and play and our 20 month old HATES it as it is hard and uncomfortable. I got this as a last ditch attempt and I have to say this was a blessing and the baby actually slept in the pack and play because of this mattress. I am not getting anything for this review - just wanted to tell you this is "for real" and really made all the difference. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Tara P

customer_reviews.title: Praise the Lord for this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has been a Godsend!!! My son absolutely hated the pack n play. Once I would put him in it, he would scream until I got him out. I was going on vacation and needed him to be able to sleep in his pack n play since his crib wasn't coming with us. I purchased this mat and VIOLA he slept in his pack n play with no issues!!! It fit perfectly in my Graco PackNPlay. I highly recommend this to anyone to try! The picture is my 3 months old laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: I researched pack & play mattresses extensively in advance of a long trip I was taking with my toddler. If you've done similar research, you know that options are limited when it comes to trifolds. I was so relieved when this product popped up on Amazon, at the price point it did. It worked great for our trip. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tessie Topol

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed!!! Just opened the mattress bc we have 2 mattresses already and this one isn’t like the others. The middle part of the mattress is flat and sunken in...like not enough mattress padding which is so upsetting because we have purchased 2 of the same mattress from this company and the quality seems to be going down
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taormina

customer_reviews.title: *NOT* WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: This is in NO WAY waterproof. Not even a little. The first time my baby’s diaper leaked, it went straight through the “waterproof” cover into the mattress. The reason I bought this overpriced item is because I though it was waterproof! And now that I’ve spent $60 on this, I get to buy a [real] waterproof cover for an extra $20 or $30! Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Fits Chicco lullaby play yard
customer_reviews.text: So far we love it. It's a little extra cushion but not so much that it is unsafe. We have the Chicco lullaby play yard and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry eldridge

customer_reviews.title: BUGS!!! And DIRTY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened this, I noticed something wasn't right. It had an odd odor to it and it was discolored in a couple spots. When I looked closer, there was black spots all over the padding inside. I noticed one of the spots moved. I immediately packaged it up and returned it before I could even see what else was going on with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mattress in that my girl will sleep on it all night and sleep quite soundly. When i need to clean it, it is very easy to clean. As far as durability, it shows a little wear quickly. But for the price, its not to bad. IT IS NOT WATERPROOF!!!!! More importantly, it is not pee proof. Twice now when my girl's diaper didn't catch it all, I've had to take the mattresses and the mattress cover apart and wash them because they were soaked through with urine. I will be buying a separate waterproof mattress cover to cover the "waterproof" cover
customer_reviews.author: Shane Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sweaty mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cushy mattress and perhaps it would have worked in a different pack n play or different type of bed but I put this in a Graco pack n play and my son woke up completely drenched In sweat and crying. I know it was the mattress because we used the pack n play for six nights and only one of the nights did he wake up like this and it was the night I used the mattress. My son is almost 3 and the mattress is very padded so I thought it would help but it didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: beck767

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Graco Pack n Play!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit the Graco pack n play. Pretty disappointing. Other than that it’s great but don’t get it if you own the Graco Pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 month old because we were going on our first overnight trip with her and the regular pack n play mattress didn't seem thick enough. Well I put my daughter in it and she sunk right in and couldn't move around in it. It's just not firm enough. I wanted something that would give a little cushion but still be sturdy enough for a baby so I wouldn't have to worry about her suffocating in it. Definitely don't recommend for babies.... Not sure what I would recommend it for to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: VERY soft
customer_reviews.text: Bought for an upcoming road trip. I’ve been shopping around and finally decided on this one. It arrives rolled up and needs 48 hours to fully inflate. So far I can say it fits my Graco Twin Pack n Play. Everything looks good so far, it’s a little too soft for my liking I feel like something a little more firm would be safer for baby to sleep on. Foam inside is just a regular foam piece you could find at a craft store. Do buy your own waterproof liner- the one that comes with it is not waterproof at all. Nothing super special but it should work for our purposes. Will update after our trip
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient but sheet doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Good support, seems similar to our crib mattress so my daughter slept well while traveling. Slightly big for our graco pack’n’play so I had to squish it into corners. Had same issue as other reviews that a sheet made it fold over on itself which isn’t safe so I had to use without. The cover that comes with it easily snags so not being able to use a sheet I ruined the protective cover by snagging :( bummed about this. Having to remove the whole protective cover each time to clean (since I can’t use a sheet) is a pain because each of the 3 sections is a separate zipper pocket. Comes with a nice carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: bmommaof3

customer_reviews.title: but it looks like it will settle and stretch a bit once there ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good—this mattress fits perfectly and snugly in our Graco Pack 'n Play Playard Reversible Napper & Changer LX. No visible gaps around the edges. The Graco Pack 'n Play quilted mattress cover pulls the mattress up a bit at the edges, but it looks like it will settle and stretch a bit once there is weight put on it (the cover was washed and dried). Haven't had the baby yet to test it out, but visually it does the job, and the fact that the mattress folds up for easy relocating is an appealing quality for once baby is older and can nap outside of the Pack 'n Play as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this mattress. We ordered it over 7 months ago for our daughters pack n play. Since it is her primary crib, and now that she’s an older toddler, we wanted the added support and softness. However, in the Graco Pack N Play, the mattress leaves a gap on both ends. Additionally, we had issues with it not laying flat...the center of the trifold let bunching up thus defeating the purpose of the flat surface of a mattress. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tiarra

customer_reviews.title: Pack n play upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Baby has been sleeping wonderfully on this pad. We kept the cheap, hard thin mat our pack n play originally came with that has no padding anymore after first child and just added this mat on top and covered with a crib sheet that I tighten since it's big. Love the material of the cover and the padding. Washed well after the first use and think it will hold up for as long as we need it. Wish I would have ordered earlier with my first child. It isn't a perfect fit because it's a hair too long but is able to squish enough that it doesn't really matter. Love it and so satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! The fact that it folds and came with this handy bag made it super easy to travel with! It is very soft so probably not appropriate for a newborn but I used it with my son at 13 months and it worked great! We did have a delay and experienced quite a bit of rain on the flight home and the bag did NOT keep water off the mattress. However, it dried out fast and it was easy to remove the cover on the mattress and wash! I bought the "Playard Sheets, 2 Pack Fitted Soft Jersey Cotton Playpen Sheet,..." sheets from Jomolly and they fit perfectly! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sgt.Ogre

customer_reviews.title: This matress is just okay
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before making a purchase, my daughter needed something a little more comfy for sleeping in her pac n play. I think this is on the higher priced end and I'm not sure if it's worth the extra $$. It seems to be fine quality and the bag it came with is perfect. I don't think it's any better or worse then the others that are a little less $$... I'll keep it, but not sure if I would buy again. We will see how it holds up...
customer_reviews.author: LauraLovesAndy

customer_reviews.title: Not for babies under 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: Not for babies under 1 year! No where on this page does it state that this mattress is babies over 1 year old! I bought this hoping to use it for an upcoming trip but It stayed home. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 4moms
customer_reviews.text: Soft mattress but unfortunately does not fit the 4moms breeze pack n play :(. Tried to add photo but will not let me. About 3inches too short and about 1.5 inches less in width.
customer_reviews.author: Rommy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love the product! Traveling was a nightmare because my son would not sleep well in the pack n play and we would be up all night. The mattress fits perfectly in the pack n play and after you open it and Allie it to expand over 24 hours it becomes a good size mattress. My son sleeps so well on it and i am so thankful! It tri folds and has a carrying case that is perfect for traveling. We just put it in a large bag with our pack n play. It’s 50 dollars but after a few trips of sleepless nights it’s more than worth it to get some sleep. I highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Super Buy
customer_reviews.text: We travel a lot, which means the baby is always in his pack n play. We typically are shoving as many blankets in the bottom as possible to try to give it a little extra cushion since ONE the pack n play bottom is hard AND because its so loud. This mattress solved all of those problems and is small enough it fits right next to the pack n play in our car. Its soft, comfortable, and great!
customer_reviews.author: Miss T

customer_reviews.title: Sweet dreams!
customer_reviews.text: I provide childcare and this is the third mattress I have purchased. Once the littles reach 1 yr old, I buy a mattress for inside their pack and play. Every child who has used one sleeps longer and more sound when using it. Warning: gross detail coming... the mattresses have battled urine and vomit and nothing has ever leaked through the mattress cover. The cover easily zips off and when run through the sanitation cycle in the washer it comes out looking brand new. Do not hesitate due to the expense. It is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Very portable! and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We first tried it out on our 5 month baby girl's first airplane trip. We packed it the bag it came with and fit into our large luggage. It's extremely easy to fold and fits perfectly into our Fisher Price Day n Night pack n play. I wish we knew about this with our first then maybe he would've slept and play in his pack n play. We haven't washed the removable cover yet... But I'm sure it will be fine. But most importantly. Baby girl loves it and we don't have to worry about her hitting her head hard when she roles over.
customer_reviews.author: BnD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law had one of these mattresses (except she has the NapYou which the two mattresses are practically the same thing) first and my baby always seemed to sleep comfortably on it and so I purchased one of my own to bring along with us when we go on trips! I feel good knowing that my baby is sleeping on a comfortable surface and it's definitely a plus that it folds up the way that it does to fit in the carrying case. Super convenient! Fyi.. I didn't use this mattress until after our baby was big enough to move his head. Not sure if I would recommend or feel comfortable using it before that stage.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Thompson

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT WE WERE LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: We bought a used Pack and Play and wanted to add a little more cushion for our little one to sleep on. This mattress is high quality dense foam that fits perfectly in the GRACO pack and play. One concern was that we didn't want it to be too soft, as the latest thinking is that it's not safe for babies to sleep on anything but a firm surface when they're young. We could not be happier with this purchase. Bonus- it comes with its own carrying case! Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Sal

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Know We Needed This
customer_reviews.text: I dread vacations with our baby because she refuses to sleep in her pack n play. With a weekend getaway upon us I decided to try out a mattress for my sanity. This baby slept in the pack n play for 3 nights! It was amazing! You need to air it out to get the smell out. We have the 4Moms Breeze and the mattress isn’t an exact match so there will be a gap. My daughter prefers a certain corner so we pushed the mattress to that corner and didn’t have a gap there.
customer_reviews.author: Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I feel this helps the pack and play feel more like a cribmattress. This mattress is firm like memory foam. It has to help with comfort since pack and play mattresses are like boards. This mattress folds nicely into the carrying bag for easy travel. The travel bag has a strong plastic smell, so I let it air out. Regular pack and play sheets will work and fit tightly on this mattress. I bought 2 of these. One to keep at my parents and one to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because the padding in our packnplay wasnt enough for our baby to get good naps in. We like this item-its a good thickness, fairly soft while maintaining shape and form. Our baby definitely slept better, once we positioned her so that the seams/folds between sections weren't bothering her. It wasn't a perfect fit for our pp, but it was pretty close and we didn't have issues. The only downside is cleaning it. Each of the 3 mattress pieces are in a separate compartment-makes it tricky getting things in and out-not a time saver. It has, however, served our purposes and we are satisfied with the purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Oceanus383

customer_reviews.title: compact but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Its convenient that it’s compact however when it comes to the comfort of your baby it’s absolutely terrible. The folds dip in, and it makes a boat like shape in the crib. We bring it with us on roadtrips but wouldn’t bring it on an international flight etc
customer_reviews.author: sa

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Graco Pack N Play perfectly (no gaps!) and it’s portable and foldable for easy storage.
customer_reviews.text: It fits the Graco Pack N Play perfectly. I tried a recommended Dream mattress and there was an inch gap on both sides so I returned it. This foldable mattress has no gaps and it’s portable! It comes with an awesome carrying case. I love that the mattress cover is machine washable too. Only downside is that it smells upon first opening the item. So far after washing the mattress cover and airing out the foam, they don’t smell anymore. However, the portable bag still smells even though I aired it out as well. Hopefully, over time it will dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: F. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, my son is spoiled. He will choice to sleep in our bed with its foam mattress pad over anywhere else. It took a long time and a crib mattress pad to get him in his crib. And forget about him sleeping in a pack n’ play on vacation. Traveling was beyond exhausting and stressful. I ordered this out of desperation and it was the best purchase ever! He actually will sleep more than 2 hrs in his pack n’ play! It’s small and compact for traveling. He has vomited all over and we easily washed it and put it back together. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Regan Burford

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, safe, portable, good fit, baby approved
customer_reviews.text: The whole point of pack n plays is to be portable, so I love how easily this packs up, and comes with a bag to keep clean in the car or carrying it around. My little one doesn't sleep well on those super hard pads they come with, and this is so comfortable for her, without being soft enough that she sinks in and I have to worry. It also fits perfectly I'm my basic Graco pack n play. I'm very very glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress. Read review for toddler sheet tip
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. My 17 month old slept all night in it when in the pack n play. She always sleeps in her crib so was worried about her being in the pack n play. Light and easy to travel with. Tip: when you put the sheets on, wrap it all the over the pack n play hard mattress thing also. My toddler did eventually start pulling at it and flipped one side up over and over because of how it folds. Wrapping it over the pack n play mattress prevents that
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Turn the crinkly, hard hotel play yard into the crib you have at home
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this twice now at two different hotels. Our LO slept just like home. The mattress fit perfectly in both styles of Greco pack’n’plays offered at the hotels. The casing water proofing held up to a spit up incident. The case fits two sheets along with the mattress which all fits in our suitcase. The price and functionality is so perfect that we purchased a second for the grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best mats ever!
customer_reviews.text: Super awesome Mats, perfect for taking to the park, to friends house and for the pack n play, you just fold it, put it in the bag that comes with it and you are ready to go! Super easy to clean, I always try to buy things where you just take the cover off and wash it and put it back again, even with our couches if they don’t have removable covers I don’t buy them, specially because we have dogs and even when they don’t shed I still love to wash them once every 3-4 months so I highly recommend this mats!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Would not lay flat with cloud island sheets on it
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and in great condition. It laid mostly flat when I put it in my Graco pack n play by itself, but when I attempted to put my sheets on it, it wouldn’t lay flat no matter what I tried. The mattress bent at the fold and would not flatten. It seems that the mattress is not stiff enough to handle the sheets. See pictures. I have Cloud Island sheets from Target. I will be returning this topper because I do not want to have to purchase additional sheets! Otherwise, the quality and softness were great.
customer_reviews.author: TAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed with this product! I’m unpacking it for the first time because we are traveling this weekend and I will need it for my baby to sleep in pack and play and as I was about to zip up the mattress cover that came unzipped the zipper handle literally fell apart in my hands with barely any resistance. It just crumbled off. Two zippers just crumbled off! Now I can’t even use the product because the case can’t zip up to hold the three foam parts together. So upset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It fits our ingenuity pack n play perfectly! The mattress is so soft, it's lightweight and folds down to make for easy portability. The tri-fold desgin works great because I can stick a wedge or rolled blanket underneath the top portion to prop the area where my daughters head goes- which helps with her reflux. I'm considering buying one for my dog as this would be perfect for bringing up and down the stairs and from room to room. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for traveling parents!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this for my son. I travel a lot and for years we just used a quilted pack and play sheet and I would put towels underneath for comfort. When my daughter came around and we needed a new way to travel with hotel provided pack and plays, I found this. This is so great. It’s so soft and plush that I don’t have to worry about comfort for my little one and the carry case makes it easy to pack in a large suitcase or just carry as a bag. Wonderful product and a very happy baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: If you own a pack and play, you should own this too
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why the makers of Pack-n-Play don't partner with or buy Milliard. The crib/PnP mattresses in Europe are so soft and allowed our young son to sleep comfortably during our recent vacation. Coming back to the US, we realized that he was so uncomfortable in his PnP with the board-like "mattress" so we bought this mattress. Now we can see that he is far more comfortable and sleeping better and longer, which is a must for us all. Thanks for this wonderful mattress!
customer_reviews.author: paul frohna

customer_reviews.title: Center foam piece flat
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other poor reviews have stated, the center foam piece is much flatter than the other two sections. I gave it 48 hours, but it didn’t expand. Returning the item tomorrow. For almost fifty dollars, I expect much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ames

customer_reviews.title: Baby finally sleeps well in his pack and play!
customer_reviews.text: My baby finally sleeps well in his pack and play! This is the best little mattress. It folds up nicely and I love the travel bag. It fits perfect in our graco pack and play and the pack and play sheets fit well. I got this mattress specifically because it has a mattress cover that can get tossed in the wash. I can’t believe my little guy ever slept on that hard piece of pack and play cardboard!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: My baby now sleeps successfully in the pack n play because of this
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t cleaned this yet so I can’t say anything about that. My son was sleeping in the rock n play when it was recalled so we quickly tried the crib. He was still really young and hated being away from us so we started the pack n play. The pad that it comes with is super hard so he hated it. I found this and fell in love. He sleeps in his pack n play every night. It folds easily and cake with its own carrying case. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SKYE COX

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for a week long vacation with our 2 year old & 9 month old. We have two different models of the grace pack and play and they each fit snug (which is what you want - no gaps!). Both of our kiddos slept sound! Love that they come with a machine washable cover and that they fold down into convenient carrying cases. Wish I’d have bought these much sooner!
customer_reviews.author: MinnesotaMiss

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality and greatly improves sleep
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t recommend this more. We travelled all summer and my son’s sleep didn’t suffer at all. He is picky on his mattresses. He has been since he was a couple of months old. He loves certipur-US foam mattresses and this travel one did not disappoint. It’s so easy to clean and the travel bag is really nice! We now always travel with our pack-n-play, this mattress, and a slumber-pod, which is a blackout tent and is incredible when you travel a lot. I highly recommend buying this! My son now sleeps on this on the floor at his daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The matt is super comfy, firm enough for a baby
customer_reviews.text: Been using this pack and play matt for almost 4 months now. She's 9 months now and uses her pack and play mostly as a relaxing/ snacking area usually about twice a day and almost every time it's a hassle trying to get her out of it, she loves it in there! The matt is super comfy, firm enough for a baby, and soft. Can easily goes in the washing machine, and love that the foams come out of the zip-up cover! I was worried it would be too thin to cover the bars underneath the pack and play but you can't feel a thing through it! So BIG PLUS! I would definitely recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon amiri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me youve already looked at 14 other pack n play mattresses just searching for the right one. We love this one! Baby is comfy all night long, the metal bars are digging into him anymore AND the pack n play sheets fit perfect. It goes from corner to corner without a gap like the original mattress and it's super easy to clean. Save yourself some time and just go with this one. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!! Very Comfy and excellent quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Better than our full-size crib mattress. I Purchased two different brands of pack and play folding mattresses and this one is by far better. The thicker mattress had large cracks where the mattress folds and didn't seem as comfortable. This mattress will last and folds compactly making it super easy to travel with. there are no gaps on the sides between the mattress and pack and play and there are no gaps where the mattress folds. great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Not sure for a newborn though....
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver! My baby boy wasn’t sleeping at all in his pack n play. We tried having him sleep in his pack in play for multiple nights and naps prior to our vacation in hopes he’d get used to it but he never slept for more than a few hours at a time. We bought this in just enough time to have it delivered to the hotel and sure enough, he slept 6+ hours straight every night we were there. Woo Hoo! It is pretty squishy but my little guy is 5 months and is great at lifting his head so I’m not too worried. Not sure if I’d trust it with a newborn....
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Cox

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product, grandkids would not sleep in any pack n play. Decided to try this as recommended by friend. World of difference! Slept the whole night!! Have not needed to clean yet but should be very easy as the case unzips each section independently. I also bought mattress cover and sheet for it. Wish I would of done along time ago.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Finally a good mattress for my little one to sleep on. I had bought one before she was born for the Graco pack n play we have but it was vinyl and really hard - I don't know why I kept it. I searched a lot for a good soft (but not too soft!) mattress and this one fits in the bassinet function part on top of the mattress that comes with the pack n play. Perfect with no gaps, so happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ana GF

customer_reviews.title: This is the one, I promise
customer_reviews.text: Great quality , literally passed this on to my sister in law after 1 year of my son using because it was still in great shape as if I had just bought it. She used it for half a year and gave it to her sister and currently after 3 years of passing it around guess what? STILL IN GREAT CONDITION. It’s crazy, i swear. Cause we don’t have light weight babies, our babies are huge & i assumed it would’ve flattened out by now, but NOPE
customer_reviews.author: Jaycie

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this before a trip so that my 20-month old would sleep well - the normal pack n play mattress is not very comfortable and so I wanted something that would be convenient to take with us that could make the pack n play more like his bed at home. It worked like a charm and allowed our little guy to sleep very well and, subsequently, made our trip that much more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is super easy to fold up for travel, and it makes the pack and play sooo much more comfortable for sleeping in over night. The only reason I gave it four stars is because the carry bag had a very strong odor when it arrived. The mattress was fine, but I had to air the bag out for a few weeks with scent balls in it before it dissipated. Otherwise, we love the product.
customer_reviews.author: ThroughHim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Store
customer_reviews.text: My son sleeps in a Graco Pack n Play for his naps each day. Recently we were going to be traveling for a few days and I decided to look into another mattress. This fit perfectly in his Pack n Play and seems very comfortable for him as he slept through the night. And I really appreciated the fact that the mattress folded and had a carrying case. If you travel or have a little one that spends a lot of time in the pack n play I would highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Ostrander

customer_reviews.title: A mobile crib essential for comfortable sleep
customer_reviews.text: First I didn’t think I need extra padding for the pack and play, but this mattress makes a big difference. We love it. We take it to everywhere with us when we drive (grandparents, hotel cribs etc.). It makes our baby’s sleep much more comfortable. If you travel you will appreciate that it can be folded, it makes it really easy carry. It fits perfectly all the mobile cribs we tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Zatori-Leamy

customer_reviews.title: Won me over
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived I was hesitant. I have many regulations I need to meet for sleeping surface for infants in my home childcare. I wasn’t too sure if this was going to work. I put it in the pac n olay and it fit beautifully. No gaps and my sheets fit it well too. I love that it folds up for storage. Will be looking at purchasing another one as well
customer_reviews.author: Charlson family

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This fits well in my daughter's pack n' play. Makes it much more comfortable to sleep on. I've also used this to sleep on the floor next to her crib when she was sick once, and it made it much more bearable. Easy to store next to her crib, and folds to make traveling with it easy. Would recommend. Haven't had to clean it yet, so I marked that a 4, for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Take measurements first!
customer_reviews.text: A little bummed with this purchase bc I thought it was a universal pack n play sized mattress and it is too small for out 4 moms pack n play. It only covers about 3/4 of the pack and play so it’s kind of useless for us. Make sure you take measurements before purchasing. It does however seem comfortable and comes with a nice carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: Padding Good,  Zippers BAD
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchild did not suffocate and actually slept better with this mattress. The only negative thing is the zippers for holding in the foam, are the worst zippers in the world, if they had quality control well ours must have been made when they were on break. We were going to send it back but obviously kept it..
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits graco pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I was looking for a thin mattress to go in my daughters graco pack n play and it fit it perfectly. I love that it folds for easy storage and comes with a storage bag. The only weird thing it comes in three separate foam part, and you have to zip each one individually into the cover, and it didn’t fit 100% into each part so it looks a little weird, but doesn’t affect its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: so far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this will hold up but i will update my review accordingly. I have the graco pack n play newborn napper LX- Monroe collection, and i measured it to be 37.5 x 27 and this fits perfectly. havent had issues with gapping and i truly feel that the fit is snug. i love the bag that comes with it, happy for this extra bonus as i do plan to take this pack n play with me on trips!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Super Cozy and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress fits perfectly into our Evenflo pack n play that appeared to be VERY uncomfortable for our little princess to sleep in on our last trip because the hard bottom wouldn't even stay flat, but would overlap on itself. I am hoping this mattress is something our 15 month old will find cozy enough to sleep for 11+ hours at night in a strange room. It looks very promising. There is no funky chemically smell that I noticed and I am very sensitive to those thing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: We used this in a hotel pack and play, the baby slept very well on it better than at home. We are using it in our pack 'n play at home now, he takes longer naps with it than without. It has a nice thickness to it and it is soft but firm. It folds and has a bag to pack it in, I was able to put it in our large suitcase along with his other things for a plane trip. It was recommended to me by another toddler parent and I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Zawistowski

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfect in our pack n play! So many people have said they didn't even know this was a thing but that they love it too. It makes me feel way better about the comfort for my daughter when we are traveling because this is what she will sleep in. So far she has used it once and she sleeps alot better in it than without it on that hard mat. Such an awesome idea for families who travel and don't want to use the hotel cribs!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Bacus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for traveling. I love that it doesn’t take a ton of room. We used to have a big one piece mattress for the pack and play and it would take up so much room in the car but this is perfect and it comes in a travel case which keeps it clean during transport. Storing this is also nice because it’s compact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress to use in a graco pack n play while on vacation. I’ve read a few bad reviews from people using this for infants. Thats a big no no. Obviously infants should use the standard mattress in the pack n play, i used this for a 2 year old. Its perfect for toddlers, my grandson slept great. We really like it. Nice carry case included.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover

customer_reviews.title: Traveling Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when we were traveling over the holidays with my 16 month old. Typically he has had a rough time traveling and sleeps terribly in a pack and play, whether in a hotel or at someone’s house. This mattress made such a big difference! He slept through the night every night while we were away because he was so comfy. This mattress is high quality, easy to to fold and comes in its own case for portability. I will never leave for an overnight trip without it. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: jgoldfisher

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny and inconvenience of traveling with! We recently took a trip to Disney and a cruise. Pack n plays are provided but the “mattress” included is not comfortable. We learned this the hard way on our very first trip when our baby would not sleep in a pack n play. This travel mattress is a game changer! Our little one slept great during our entire 10 day trip in pack n plays with this mattress! We just checked it in it’s travel bag and it was fine! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: This product is dangerous for babies!
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review of anything before, but this product is dangerous. Because it folds, my 16 month old baby was able to wedge himself underneath the mattress in the middle of the night. We caught it early and he’s fine, thank god. But this is a huge hazard. Trashed it immediately after.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn cremen

customer_reviews.title: Diasappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed... one section is half as thick as the other two even after I let it lay open for 48 hours. I may end up returning. Also the insert that came with it states it shouldn’t be used for an unattended infant younger than 12 months. It should state that in the description online.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Comfy baby
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I use this in a Graco packnplay as a permanent crib my room. Fits snuggly to all sides. Extremely easy to remove cover to wash and replace the foam. Carrying case has room to pack sheets with it. Does take finesse to get a crib sheet on as it will fold easily, just practice getting it on and then adjusting the corners until it lays flat.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My mother in law has a Pack and Play that she uses when she watches my daughter. She said she wasn't napping more than 30 minutes there when usually she sleeps 2 hours at home. After ordering this mattress my daughter is now sleeping the entire 2 hours at her Nanas house! This was a great purchase! The best part is that it folds and can be transported easily.
customer_reviews.author: SondraFTP

customer_reviews.title: Pack and play mattress
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased the Milliard memory foam pack and play mattress, but it was too small to fit our standard Graco pack and play. We were afraid she would roll into a "gap" so I returned it and bought this one instead because the reviews said that it was a perfect fit and IT IS! No gaps and fits nice and snug along the inside of the pack and play. In addition, it folds conveniently with a carrying bag which is perfect because I needed the mattress so she could sleep somewhere comfortably while we are on vacation. She loves it! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sherryl L.

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft, baby got stuck in the cracks
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is less than ideal and returning. It's incredibly soft, too soft for my 17 lb baby. He would roll around at night and just sink into the creases where it trifolds. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Is

customer_reviews.title: Great product for pack n play use for older children
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress! My 2 yo is 26 lbs and we use her pack n play whenever we go to Grandma’s house or hotels. Once she reached 23 lbs, the basic pack n play became very uncomfortable for her to sleep in. She would wake up crying every two hours. We had this mattress delivered for an Easter weekend trip to Grandma’s and she slept through the night! It’s light, fits snuggly into the pack n play and folds up nicely in its storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pad!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after our two year old refused to sleep in the pack n play on the thin matress (can you really blame her). Fits our pnp well and my daughter loves it. It is probably a little soft for a newborn. We travel a lot and the travel bag was a must! Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jsclark

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This a really nice, soft mattress that we purchased for travel so my daughter can sleep in her pack and play. Love that it folds up and is easy to store. My only complaint would be that is is a little difficult to get sheets on it because it tries to fold up while you are trying to put the sheets on. Not a big deal in the end but a little annoying while you are struggling with it. All in all very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nadja

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: We keep a Pack n Play at our house for when the grandbabies come over. I always thought it didn't seem very comfortable. Then my daughter told me that we could get a memory foam mattress for it! I chose this folding one for that very reason- that it folds up for easier storage! And the fact that it came with its own storage bag was an added bonus! The mattress fit perfectly and snugly over top of the other firmer pad-which gave it added support for our 2 year old. It is a little smelly when it arrives, but an hour or two outside quickly got rid of that. Glad I found this folding mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Improved Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old has always been a good sleeper, but for the last few months he’s been in a pack n play since we lost our home to a hurricane. I’ve been using a topper mattress pad but that still didn’t seem to be as much cushion so I checked out this product to help make him more comfortable for the time being. It’s going on 7:15 and he’s still asleep! Little guy is usually up around 630. Call it a coincidence but I think he slept like a rock!
customer_reviews.author: kelaw86

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our first family vacation. My baby had slept in his pack n play for a while before we moved him to his crib and we could tell he was uncomfortable on the provided "mattress." This is nice and cushy but not too cushy for me to be worried about him sleeping face down on it. Easily assembled. Easily transported. Slept just fine the whole week! Granparents are using this when they watch him for naps and bedtime too!
customer_reviews.author: KT La

customer_reviews.title: Love it- very comfortable and safe
customer_reviews.text: Love ours! Bought for my 18 mo when we travel so she is more comfortable in her PNP. I’m a big safe sleep advocate so I was very weary about this since there are not supportive or enough scientific studies for additional add ins to PNP. I feel safe having my daughter sleep here because it is cushy but still somewhat firm. Also fits into my Graco PNP perfectly with no extra room so she couldn’t end up under it or on the side. Also love how easy it is to travel with. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Do

customer_reviews.title: Awesome travel mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about my daughter being comfortable in her Cosco brand travel crib (knock off pack n' play) because she has a Sealy crib mattress and the padded particle board mattress in the travel crib is nothing compared to her normal bed. She sleeps like an angel in this and the fact that it comes with a bag with handles to travel with is even more awesome!
customer_reviews.author: GratefulART

customer_reviews.title: So much better then the pack n play pad
customer_reviews.text: My baby naps in her pack n play a lot so I wanted something better then the pad it came with. This is almost perfect. It’s nice and soft and comes with a great carrying bag...I really wish it would have come in memory foam though. Otherwise it meet what I was looking for and baby sleeps great!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Must have item alongside Gracon Pack play
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this mattress when purchasing a graco pack n play. The mattress with pack n play is very thin. Placed this folding mattress on top of the pack n play mattress for a luxurious upgrade. Fits snugly with no gaps. Folds up nice and neat with it’s own carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: vpage

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 yo loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Should have purchased this over a year ago! Our 2.5 year old needed to use his pack n play as a crib for short term living. He sleeps 10-11 hours straight since we added this to the pack n play. I don’t have any issues with the mattress fitting in our pack n play like others have stated.
customer_reviews.author: LkeMke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for pack n play
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It provides a foam padding to the pack and play, folds up nicely and even comes with a nice caring case. Fits perfectly in my graco pack n play. It comes with a soft waterproof cover but I still put a sheet over it. Crib sheets are a little big and the quilted pack n play sheet was too small for it. I had a sheet that fit a portable crib mattress that I used and that fit nicely. My eight-month-old slept great in it and I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Koch

customer_reviews.title: Soft travel pad for pack n play
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pad to put on the playard. My daughter was starting to roll over so we looked the playard but it was too stiff and she did not sleep well. After we bought this, she slept with minimal tossing. Some larger changing covers will fit snugly on this pad. Baby cribs sheets are too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Really soft, easy to pack up
customer_reviews.text: Really soft and nice for baby without being dangerous. The carrying bag to use for travel is a little larger than the mattress, which is really nice because you don’t need to break a sweat to get it in the bag, not to mention you have some extra space for packing burp cloths, bibs, etc! We use this on top of the pack n play mattress. Our baby sleeps so well with this compared to what comes with the pack n play!
customer_reviews.author: Weona

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: This mattress worked perfectly for our toddler in our Graco pack n play. We were looking for something with more cushion to it than what comes with the pack n play for our 2 year old. It was super easy to travel with and the bag that comes with it is very nice. Most importantly our toddler slept great on this all week on our vacation! Very satisfied with this!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Chicco
customer_reviews.text: We have a Chicco lullaby playard and it was very hard to find a mattress that fit. It is perfect! Makes for a very comfortable sleep. Our little one is 14 months and she only sleeps in the pack and play when we are traveling. This mattress helps ease the transition since the hard bottom is so different than an a crib mattress. But I think if you had than sleep in one regularly this would make sleep so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ma'am

customer_reviews.title: Great pack n play mattress
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and fit in my graco pack n play perfectly. Love that it folds. I was worried it might not be thick enough and while it is thinner than other mattresses, I feel like it provides plenty of cushion for my LO. Only criticism is that when it arrived, the cover was on but not zipped up which I didnt understand.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Purchased after a very challenging weekend trip when our 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after a very challenging weekend trip when our 18 month old decided she would not sleep in her pack n play any longer. Since adding this, she has slept perfectly in it, as well as she does in her crib at home. It seems appropriately soft and I would expect it to last. The places where it folds are not noticeable with the mattress cover and sheet on.
customer_reviews.author: RLE

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The tri-fold doesn’t fit great inside all pack and plays. It bulges up in the middle since it folds. I didn’t like that it doesn’t lays flat in the Graco pack and play. If you plan to travel, this might work if your don’t mind that it doesn’t lay flat. If you plan to not move it, then I would get the one that doesn’t fold. For the price, I think it could been made better.
customer_reviews.author: Teri H.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed...
customer_reviews.text: The Milliard Tri-fold pack n' play mattress is everything I was looking for. It folds, has a waterproof cover, and a carrying bag! An easy mattress to travel with for an upcoming trip with my son. When I read the negative reviews it almost discouraged me from purchasing this mattress. I decided to take a chance and it paid off. I was able to fold the mattress up and put it in my trunk during my trip back in May. The waterproof cover works great! I've washed and dryed the cover several times with no issues. The mattress itself is great! It's soft yet firm at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big for pack and play
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was purchased for a standard pack and play and is way too big. Other than that, if it did fit it would be a great addition for comfort to the pack and play. It also has a "warehouse" kind of smell to the foam but after washing the cover and putting it back on, we could no longer smell it.
customer_reviews.author: BingBangBoom

customer_reviews.title: Sleep has improved with this mattress
customer_reviews.text: My son sleeps so much better in the pack n play now that we have this mattress. He doesn't like being on his back and the pack n play insert is so hard that he's instantly uncomfortable when we put him to bed. This mattress solves that problem. It's super soft, and originally we thought it was probably too soft, but he doesn't sink into it so it's perfect. It's a little too big for the pack n play, but we just lift the end where his feet are slightly and it's fine. I only have this 4 stars because of the fit in the pack n play. We have a Graco
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a box that has your thinking that it is not going to fit the pack and play but that’s because they have vacuumed all the air out of the mattress to make for smaller shipping. I wish I had known about these long before now. Very soft easy to clean and stores away nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Wright

product_meta.title: Milliard Tri-Fold Pack N' Play Mattress Topper - Plus Free Bonus Carry Case
feature_bullets: SLEEP IN COMFORT – Help your child sleep better by replacing the thin, hard mattress that comes with the pack-n-play. Constructed from top quality, high density foam, this mattress provides the perfect balance between firm support and soft comfort so your little one can sleep better - and you can too!

MAXIMUM PORTABILITY – Milliard original trifold design allows you to easily fold up your mattress into the bonus carry bag that’s included for free - so you can easily store or travel with your mattress. It can be used without a playard as well for the perfect toddler sleeping mat.
WATERPROOF COVER – Comes with a top-quality, polyester cover that’s both waterproof and washable so you never have to worry about keeping your mattress clean.
Lab Tested – Our topper's foam meets CertiPUR-US standards for content, emissions and durability, and are analyzed by independent, accredited testing laboratories.

MORE DETAILS - Soft mattress is not intended for babies. Consult with physician for safety recommendations. Measures 38x26x1.5 with rounded corners for a perfect universal fit. Please allow 24 to 48 hours for foam to expand after opening.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,121 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
